lead_paragraph: ¶The Colorado Rockies have won 21 of their last 22 games, a stretch matched during the season by only four teams in baseball history: the 1947 and 1953 Yankees, the 1977 Kansas City Royals and the 2002 Oakland Athletics. None of those teams had their stretches immediately preceding the World Series.
